website_summaries.verdict: The Brooks Addiction 13 didn’t garner exclusively positive feedback from its consumers. While many runners were happy with this motion control shoe’s comfortable and durable cushioning unit, a handful of them also complained that it was stiff and bulky-looking. And while the stability mechanisms were lauded for being highly efficient at maintaining a stable gait, the fit-profile was criticized for being too narrow. Those who liked this road shoe got what they asked for, but there were others who didn’t thoroughly enjoy what it had to offer.
pros: Several testers stated that a break-in period was not needed for this shoe
it was apparently comfortable right out of the box
This running shoe offered adequate support during speed workouts and daily walks, some people noted
Consumers lauded the cushioning system of the Brooks Addiction 13, emphasizing its capacity to prevent the foot and leg from experiencing strain
The traction capacity of the outsole unit was touted to be highly reliable, according to many consumers
Heavyset runners were happy that the underfoot platform was able to retain its structural integrity and carry the weight of their bodies
The stability mechanisms present in this product were lauded because they corrected pronation and guided the gait
cons: Some consumers stated that the in-shoe experience was narrower than what they expected
According to several testers, the eyelets of the upper unit tended to rub against the skin, causing hot spots and irritation
The collar of this shoe has developed some holes, giving doubt as to the overall durability of the façade
The forefoot section was too snug that the fabrics rubbed against the toes and bunched them together awkwardly, based on a handful of reviews
Some runners didn’t like the color schemes that were available for the Brooks Addiction 13, stating that the options were bland
The underfoot platform was thick and inflexible, a few people complained

customer_reviews.title: Brooks shoes are too narrow in the toe box area
customer_reviews.text: color and shoe look nice, toe box is too narrow in the size 13ee. I've had other Brooks addictions in the same size and it appears Brooks keeps changing the toe box area. I tried the 13 4 e and it was too big. So until Brooks makes a wider toe box I'm going to switch to New Balance. I've been a Brooks addiction & beast customer for years. Both shoes are now too narrow in the toe box .even in the wider sizes. Too bad, they used to make a really nice comfortable shoe for people with wider feet and a few foot problems. Submitted by Rich
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best Brooks!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Brooks shoes for many years now. They are my go to choice in athletic/running shoes. However, I have a couple issues with this shoe ... 1. I normally wear a 10 in shoes. So, naturally I ordered a 10. Should have ordered a 10.5. 2. For a brand new shoe, they sure do squeak a lot and make all sorts of noises. I should have returned them, but I was hoping the squeaking issue would have gone away as I broke them in. Nope!!! Now I am stuck with squeaky shoes :(
customer_reviews.author: Ventura9496

customer_reviews.title: Honey, They shrunk the shoes! - Getting to the sole of the matter
customer_reviews.text: Just got a pair of of Addiction 13 in 10.5/2E and they are a bit too tight in the toe box. I've owned a couple of Brooks Addictions over the years -- with my latest pair being an Addiction 12 -- and until the 13 they all had a similar fit. When I hold the 13 up sole to sole against the 12 I can see that they narrowed/shorted the toe box on the 13 just slightly. I'm ordering a 1/2 size up to see if things get better.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Lacks quality materials for upper parts of the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe sizes Are not accurate they are just a little small. While the shoe is very comfortable to walk in, the shoe adhesives are breaking down on the inside of shoe. Notice the fabric tops around the ankle also have a wear hole.These shoes are six month old and need replacement . ( see pic.)
customer_reviews.author: Don Cline

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great and the Quality is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an ASICS GT fan for several years. However my challenge when purchasing new shoes is finding a great quality shoe in my size which is a 14 Narrow. I have never owned a pair of Brooks. The Addiction 13 fits accordingly to my size, just right and not to small. The stability is far better than the ASICS GT series that I have been wearing. In addition they look great. I will be a repeat buyer! You can not go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: good solid shoe with plenty of toe room and great ...
customer_reviews.text: good solid shoe with plenty of toe room and great arch support. just had knee replacement and these shoes completely filled my expectations for my rehab therapy
customer_reviews.author: Roosevelt Smyly Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fitment issues with the Addiction 13
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased with anticipation they'd be like the preceding model year. They were not... fitment was not the same, and a little tighter for the same size shoe. Also, the darker color combination was not as attractive or desirable upon closer study. Upon return, Asics were ordered and those fit fine. Miss wearing the Brooks, as they're a great shoe normally, but the "13" was unlucky for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Duke

customer_reviews.title: Change in Fit?
customer_reviews.text: I normally order shoes in 10D (medium width) but with these shoes had to go to size 11D. Even then they are a bit short and narrow feeling. I am still working them out. I am not a runner but use them for long walks. Shoe quality appears to be very good, just seems to be some sizing issues. My wife recently bought a new pair of shoes and they ran small as well. Maybe all the shoe makers are going to a new shoe last. Who knows?
customer_reviews.author: J.Clyde

customer_reviews.title: A Great Looking Brooks Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I almost always buy Brooks shoes as they are high quality and give me good support for a tendon issue. My Podiatrist recommended Brooks to me. This particular shoe seems to run a bit small. I always order a 1/2 size larger in Brooks anyway, but probably should have gone a full size up for this model. I still like them but will probably not wear them as much as I would have due to the fit. They are very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: SQUEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: Brooks Addiction 13: Nice looking, fits well, but my orthotics SQUEAK. They've been cleaned. But, this never happened before with this brand of sneaker...my husband's reacted same way. He also had to return the shoes. Problem. When you buy Zappos shoes through Amazon you only have a 30-day return window. Direct Zappos gives you a year or more....? SUCKS. Shoes are too expensive to get caught in this. Didn't realize the return window was so short.
customer_reviews.author: A. F.

customer_reviews.title: First time buying Brooks shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical buying shoes that I have never heard of. But after going to physical therapy for a torn ligaments and tendon on my left knee plus having a severe pronation which defiantly didn't help. I was having a lot of discomfort when I was at work and specially working 12hrs shifts I must admit that the shoes are really comfortable and it has help with the discomfort on my knees and overall I don't feel like I have been standing and walking for 12hrs a day. Defiantly will be buying another pair soon. 100% Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Wide toe box
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what to say...my foot has had 2 surgeries already and about to have one more. I had trouble finding shoes to fit because my toe box area has widened so much. Brooks is excellent about making a wide toe box to fit. I am walking in these daily. Couldn't find any Nike, ASIC, or any other shoe except for a Sketchers shoe which helped early on.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Mcgee

customer_reviews.title: Best motion control shoe available
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable running shoe ever. Feels like walking on clouds. I wear them every day at work and for training. They provide very solid motion control-I use orthotics for flat feet and go 6'5, 230# ; any shoes without adequate motion control will usually cave in quickly due to my over-pronation. I've been a runner for 30 years and these are my favorite shoes, no doubt. Beast always seem too bulky. These remind me of the now defunct Asics Gel MC.
customer_reviews.author: erik sinka

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Brooks Addictions for the past 7or 8 years. I am a pronator and my old shoes were causing my foot to hit the ground improperly, causing pain and discomfort in my knee and hip joints. Since switching to the Addictions, I have no more such pain in my knee and hip joints. They are very comfortable to wear with just the right amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade from earlier version
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Addictions and this is by far the one that feels best on my feet. Makes it easy for me to walk around, run, workout. Overall a great shoe. Great control and comfort. Would highly recommend this shoe if you need the control. Brooks makes a pretty nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Max Silent

customer_reviews.title: Like the Beast BUT Lighter
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the Beast for a couple of years. It has huge heel strike cushioning, however, they are overpriced and heavy. I bought this shoe to see if I could get reasonable heel cushioning but a lighter shoe. It achieved both goals. It has reasonable heel strike cushioning and is lighter. Recommend giving them a try.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Very good, with one flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I have EE width feet and need motion control. These shoes fit well, provide the necessary motion control, and are very comfortable right out of the box. I would give them five stars except that the soft fabric at the top frays prematurely. This has happened with two pairs; the second starting fraying after only a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Russ S.

customer_reviews.title: along with doctor recommended orthotics to be my very best solution
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of Brooks Addition shoes. I have foot issues that cause over pronating. Found this shoe, along with doctor recommended orthotics to be my very best solution. However, I do wish more color selection would be provided. Construction wise----perfect
customer_reviews.author: Larry McArtor

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: My husband has severe foot issues his podiatrist asked him to get different shoes and gave us a list with a few names. These not only look good on him they feel good. I would happily stock up on this shoe if I found a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence L.

customer_reviews.title: Brooks suppports their products
customer_reviews.text: I have to update this review as Brooks offered to replace the defective shoes with a newer model at no cost. My faith in this company has been redeemed. I give 4 stars as the original pair of shoes squeaked.
customer_reviews.author: JF Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than size indicates
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up - seems like a great shoe, but I wear a 9 1/2. I ordered 1/2 size bigger, which is kinda normal for me with Brooks. I was surprised when I tried on the size 10 to have it feel so cramped. I am returning the size 10, and trying a size 10.5. Hopefully that will do the trick
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Ive had a pair of these before, thats why i searched for them again. They fit great, feel great, and look great. I just had surgery on my left foot and everything seemed to hurt my foot except these. I love these shoes!! Best price around also, i saved 30.00 from anywhere else :)
customer_reviews.author: John Amos

customer_reviews.title: I miss the Brooks Addiction 12
customer_reviews.text: I have had 4 pairs of Brooks Addiction 12, all are 13 Wide. With the brooks addiction 13 the 13 wide was too short and the 14 wide seems loose. I will probably keep the 14 wides but they are not a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. Very nice quality. Fit as expected.My husband loves these shoes and he is very picky. This was a replacement pair of Brooks to ones he had pretty much worn out over last two plus years.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great overall. Seem a tad small on one side as part of my foot rubs. Shoes are super comfy other than that, however the support doesn't seem to last as long as the dyad.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: I've been wearing Brooks Addictions for 25 years.
customer_reviews.text: If you tend to pronate, these shoes will help a lot. With them, I was also able to delay bunion and hammer toe surgery for two decades. It's very helpful that you can get them in wide sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Survivor

customer_reviews.title: New is not always better
customer_reviews.text: Different support than previous versions. It seems like it is sized a little smaller, and constructed cheaply. They don't wear like they will last as long.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rodwell

customer_reviews.title: Brooks. Makes a great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: For the price point these are a great value. I hope they don’t change them in the future I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: A diappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was just wanting walking shoes. My first walk was a short one. Support is lousy. I'll try putting orthodics and try again. If not, back they go! I gave it two stars instead on one because they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R. Chaudoir

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: My teen has wide feet, he is tough on shoes, and he plays sports. They are the best shoe we have ever purchased. In fact these are his second pair. They hold up like no other. We have tried every other brand. They are comfortable and They look very nice too! I do recommend this shoe👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Leann Phillips

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I’m just dissapointed because they don’t give me any support and my feet hurt after walking/jogging/running in these. But for a regular sneaker to wear without being active, sure.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shoe model for years because of my wide feet. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying them
customer_reviews.text: My loves husband loves them. He had the walkers before but they were not available this time, but he says they are the same.
customer_reviews.author: JMeff

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I walk every day and it only took about three weeks for the sole to start separating from the shoe body. This is the second pair of this brand where that has happened. These shoes help my pronation but I can't see buying another pair due to the poor workmanship. Giving it two stars because they do fit me well
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Scott Ellis

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Bought my sneakers on Jan 26 and already the right front of sneaker is coming away
customer_reviews.author: michael petko

customer_reviews.title: Great company ... this shoe missed the size mark
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of size 14 EE Brooks running shoes including the previous model the Brooks Addiction 12. This particular model the Addiction 13 is exceptionally small compared to other Brooks shoes. It fits like a shoe a full size smaller. I wear a size 13 1/2 dress shoe but required a size 14 in a Brooks running shoe in the past with athletic socks. I fear a size 15 would be much too large.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin English

customer_reviews.title: Brooks delivers again
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Brooks Addiction shoes for years. They are the only shoe that fits perfectly right out of the box. No need for breaking in.
customer_reviews.author: Miles V Hoelzel

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit
customer_reviews.text: Its a good shoe, I've owned several of these in the past and was replacing a pair of Brooks Addictions, but this pair was very different in size and not comfortable at all, especially on the left foot. Unfortunately had to return and this time I'm going to a retail store to find the right pair that fits.
customer_reviews.author: awesome

customer_reviews.title: brooks
customer_reviews.text: have been wearing these fit is good [I buy 1 size up] support seems good brooks last me a long time
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Meneely

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoes; I started wearing them when the Beast became too expensive. Pretty good alternative to the Beast; not as heavy duty but more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Retired shop teacher

customer_reviews.title: sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These are my husband's favorite sneaker. He has a wide foot and has orthotics he needs to place in his shoes. These accommodate both.
customer_reviews.author: 2cats2cute

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable, so painful, so expensive, so disappointed. I gave it more than a month of walking, running, jogging, but nothing. Just more pain. I overpronate and I got this shoe hoping it will help with some knee pain from jogging, bad choice.
customer_reviews.author: Hashim Arif

customer_reviews.title: Missed sized
customer_reviews.text: Miss sized or they run small. Should have returned but was to sick at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Not really true to size
customer_reviews.text: I've worn size 9.5 as long as I can remember. The toe box was tight. Replaced with addiction Walker, they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Billie F

customer_reviews.title: I have an 'A' width heal. Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: So difficult to find any shoe where my heel doesn't slip and slide. These fit perfectly. The cushioning is excellent, too. I am using these for casual dress only, but I imagine they would make a wonderful running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Ochs

customer_reviews.title: Wide and snug fit.. Great materials used ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for extra wide feet... Used them for walking everyday ... So far, they held up. I think BROOKS thought much for people with WIDE and LONG feet. Thank you BROOKS!
customer_reviews.author: Bizdak26

customer_reviews.title: I like these athletic shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. I have purchased many pairs of these for basketball.
customer_reviews.author: S.J. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and fitting shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I wish that Brooks had not gone away from this style...this is a classic!
customer_reviews.author: HGSJR

customer_reviews.title: Cofmfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable shoes...probably the most comfortable shoes of its type I've ever worn. Soft feeling inside keeps my feet quite happy. Great looking shoe and well worth the purchase. Recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jeff schmitt

customer_reviews.title: These help with the arch support in Terry's feet. ...
customer_reviews.text: These help with the arch support in Terry's feet. They are not for everyone. You need to try them on before you purchase them. Then you can reorder online for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for flat feet
customer_reviews.text: Seriously worth evey cent. I am flatt-footed and discovered Brooks after my doc recomended them. What a suprise! They really do make live better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I have the previous years model, and the toebox on this one is so narrow by comparison despite buying a larger size width. I was really surprised as to how differently it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Coux

customer_reviews.title: Running shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair great fit very easy on my back. Best shoe out there for modern everyday use. Well worth the money and the do last
customer_reviews.author: Rick Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Little snug
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was snug in the toe area, but I weaseling orthotics. Sent back and got a larger shoe and am very satisfied with them
customer_reviews.author: Don Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoe, great stability!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I am a huge Brooks fan.. their shoes fit well and last better than pretty much everything else I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: R. Maday

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for big guys or those with low arches
customer_reviews.text: Slightly wider than most shoes. I have flat feet with a wide toe and the standard size fits nicely. Excellent arch support.
customer_reviews.author: louisvilleguy

customer_reviews.title: Compensates for the pronated step.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pronated step which cause me to ware down the out side of my shoe very fast. I felt comfort immediately when walking with these shoes and it seems to have relieved the pain in my knee as well.
customer_reviews.author: stevebuelow01

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought these for running, he loves them. Ditched his Nikes and Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Finally a shoe I can wear!
customer_reviews.text: I have had bunion surgery and it is very difficult to find shoes with good arch support and a wide enough toe box that are actually comfortable. These have all of that! They run small, though. I had to exchange mine for a half size larger. I am also very happy with the level of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Walker

customer_reviews.title: they fit Perfect
customer_reviews.text: they are the best. Highly recommend them to any one looking to buy Good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Not for shin splints
customer_reviews.text: I had the brooks addiction 12 and got the 13 when it came for a change. Didn't have anything to compare it to untill I got the hoka Bondi 6. Day and night difference.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell gaines

customer_reviews.title: I would go to a good shoe store and really get some advice on what to wear.  Brooks has been #1
customer_reviews.text: Brooks makes a great shoe. I already own a pair so to order a 2nd took no guess work on this.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Terrible !!!!
customer_reviews.text: They were not as expected Too Narrow Too heavy Very clunky returned them as soon as they were received !!!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Hansman

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent shoe for severe pronation.
customer_reviews.text: I particularly enjoy the support they provide for my severe pronation. They are more comfortable than any of my shoes or slippers. This is my third pair of Brooks, the best yet. They are even comfortable on the tennis court.
customer_reviews.author: James Crawford

customer_reviews.title: shoe size runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger, because past experience with shoes is 50/50 on fit. these were still a little tight, but comfortable. I like the arch support a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Paula I Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Half size up is required.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive shoes. Four stars for looks. Had to return first order because of size, too small. Appears sizes available run half inch smaller than what I normally order. Comfort is better than other brands but not as good as Addiction leather.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Every day shoes for my spouse! They got great and are comfortable and give good support!
customer_reviews.author: debra christeson

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for running for years. Never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top of The Line Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is absolutely worthy of the highest rating! It is the best fitting running shoe that I own. They are comfortable and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very nice & comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. He has pseudo gout & many problems with his feet. He says he finally found a good tennis shoe!
customer_reviews.author: patpark

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: My son has huge feet. He loves these. And they hold up well. He is hard on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Llap

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit! He has two pairs of these. They look great and are so comfortable. That's what he told me!!
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes for me - but I have a strange foot. Happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Alan Menter

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are solid support shoes, they are comfortable, and work well for a heavy guy.
customer_reviews.author: LDMPOR

customer_reviews.title: Liked them but wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look and the shoe in general, but it did not fit.
customer_reviews.author: James Campbell

customer_reviews.title: I've worn this make & model for over 20 years ...
customer_reviews.text: I've worn this make & model for over 20 years, so I know what I'm getting when I order them.
customer_reviews.author: Panorpdx

customer_reviews.title: I like the new toe box, but they run small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe runs a half size smaller than the Brooks Beast they are replacing
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement for the old 12 model. Wish they came in other than black.
customer_reviews.author: bots491

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and the best support
customer_reviews.text: The best shoe available for those with flat feet and maybe a few extra pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for flat and wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking/running shoe with tons of support for flat and wide feet. Particularly helpful for no or low arch. Love Brooks!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Brooks Mens Addiction 13 run small. Seller does not give any Heads Up on Running Small !
customer_reviews.text: These Brooks mens Addiction 13 sneakers sold by Marathon run small and no advice is given to customers to help with fit. Even the reviews did not help out. I returned the sneakers to seller Marathon and had to pay for the return postage ! This is No way to treat a Prime customer !!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kulak

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! They last long and feel great. On the third pair over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of shoes I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: My job has me on my feet all day. I had real problems with foot pain before I purchased the Brooks Addiction. This will be the second pair of these shoes I’ve purchased. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Klarkkent312

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but they run way smaller than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: The Rooster

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought fir husband....his second pair of these because he loves them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Wieland

customer_reviews.title: Sized half size small...
customer_reviews.text: Cut much smalller in toe box than Addiction 12. Other reviews did mention this. Unfortunately, I have one foot that’s a 13 and the orher’s a 12.5 so I have to split the difference. Sizing up would be to big for my small foot. Great cushioning and medial support for overpronators.
customer_reviews.author: B. Myro

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good product. Well manufactured will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product. Well manufactured will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.

customer_reviews.title: There are very expensive
customer_reviews.text: Other than the seam midway inside the shoe that rubbed a blister on my foot, they provide the best platform of any shoe that I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Pegues

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: love these shoes they fit my feet perfect. brooks makes a good product. way to go amazon for making purchase easy
customer_reviews.author: Costa G.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fit and the work well with my tendency for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fit and the work well with my tendency for pronation. They are pretty durable and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RonB

customer_reviews.title: Consistent fit.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these since Addiction 7. Always perfect fit and support.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Possibly the best shoe in the market for people with supination
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Finally found sneakers that fit! And I can wear them almost anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: John Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Foot odor retention.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe retains foot odor so wash out every 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Volker

customer_reviews.title: fit
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. The fit is great and they're very comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne D. Sextro

customer_reviews.title: Quality continues to decline
customer_reviews.text: The quality of Brooks has dropped in recent years. I've been wearing this shoe for less than a few months and the interior lining is already peeling and coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: As usual Brooks always come thru with comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate that Brooks always produces a shoe that fits the same every time. Doesn't always happen with others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit shoes as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Finally fit after couple of pairs returned... Awesome fit but too pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was having problems with shoes, but this was comfortable, fit well, feet doesn't get tired and sore. Great Shoe!! Very Happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shimizu

customer_reviews.title: Fitting
customer_reviews.text: Bought this online after reading the reviews from various sources. I usually wear Brooks Beast but thought i'd give Addiction. It fits well and i'm happy with the shoes - especially after some runs.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Lam

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Addiction 13 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Fall in love with the new Addiction 13. The BioMoGo DNA midsole provides adaptive cushioning, while the Extended Progressive Diagonal Rollbar guarantees stability and comfort. The Segmented Crash Pad allows a soft and flowing heel-toe transition. If you add to all this an extra-comfortable upper in perforated mesh for moisture transpiration, you will discover why these shoes are addictive, but without any unpleasant side effects. Features: The BioMoGo DNA midsole offers adaptive cushioning, the Crash Pad segmented along the entire length of the foot ensures smooth transitions, the Omega Flex Grooves improve flexibility, great for running on the road, ideal for those with medium arched feet / flat, ideal for those with moderate pronation, 12 mm thick midsole. Weight 383 gr.
